span.span: The type of elements in the list.

summary.span: 提供支持数据绑定的泛型集合。

span.span: Provides a generic collection that supports data binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可用作基类，以创建双向数据绑定机制。The class can be used as a base class to create a two-way data-binding mechanism. 提供 接口的具体泛型实现。 provides a concrete, generic implementation of the interface. 这是实现完整 接口的一种替代方法，因为 、和关联的 之间存在微妙的交互，这可能会很困难。This is an alternative to implementing the complete interface, which can be difficult because of the subtle interaction between , , and the associated . 不过，典型解决方案程序员将使用提供数据绑定功能的类，如 ，而不是直接使用 。However, the typical solutions programmer will use a class that provides data binding functionality, such as , instead of directly using . 通过可扩展 方法支持工厂创建的实例。 supports factory-created instances through the extensible method. （也可在其他类中找到此类可扩展性，如 ）此外，由于此类实现 接口，因此它通过 和 方法启用新项的事务提交或回滚。(This same type of extensibility is also found in other classes, such as ) In addition, since this class implements the interface, it enables transactional commits or rollbacks of the new item through the and methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何绑定到包含业务对象的 组件。The following code example demonstrates binding to a component containing a business object. 这是包含 `Main` 方法的完整示例。This is a complete example that contains a `Main` method. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AddingNew As AddingNewEventHandler

summary.span: 在将项添加到该列表之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an item is added to the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生在将新对象添加到由 属性表示的集合之前。The event occurs before a new object is added to the collection represented by the property. 调用 方法后，但在创建新项并将其添加到内部列表之前，将引发此事件。This event is raised after the method is called, but before the new item is created and added to the internal list. 通过处理此事件，程序员可以提供自定义项的创建和插入行为，而无需强制从 类派生。By handling this event, the programmer can provide custom item creation and insertion behavior without being forced to derive from the class. 有关提供自定义新项功能的详细信息，请参阅 方法。For more information about supplying custom new item functionality, see the method. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For the complete example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance !T AddNew() cil managed

summary.span: 将新项添加到集合。

span.span: Adds a new item to the collection.
The item added to the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将一个新项添加到由 属性表示的集合中。The method adds a new item to the collection represented by the property. 若要添加新项，请使用以下逻辑：To add a new item, the following logic is used: 1. 自动引发 事件。The event is automatically raised. 可以通过编程方式处理此事件以构造新的自定义项。This event can be programmatically handled to construct a new custom item. 在事件处理程序中，通过将 参数的 属性设置为新项来完成此操作。This is accomplished in the event handler by setting the property of the parameter to the new item. 否则，新项将通过其公共的无参数构造函数自动创建。Otherwise, the new item is automatically created through its public parameterless constructor. 2. 跟踪新项的位置，但在满足以下条件之一之前，不会将其添加到列表中：The position of the new item is tracked, but it is not added to the list until one of the following conditions are met: - 通过调用 显式提交该项。The item is explicitly committed by a call to . - 项由更改列表内容的其他操作隐式提交，如插入或移除项。The item is implicitly committed by some other operation that changed the contents of the list, such as an insertion or removal of an item. 相反，在提交项之前调用 方法将导致放弃新项。In contrast, calling the method before the item is committed will cause the new item to be discarded. 提交新项时，此方法会引发 事件。This method raises the event when the new item is committed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 列中的一个值匹配。. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For the complete example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample/CS/Form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.ComponentModel.BindingListOfTExample/VB/Form1.vb#4)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether you can add items to the list using the method.

value.span: 如果可以使用 方法向列表中添加项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if you can add items to the list with the method; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值视列表中所包含的基础类型而定。

span.span: The default depends on the underlying type contained in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性通常由其他组件用于确定是否允许创建新项。The property is typically used by other components to determine if the creation of new items is allowed. 如果列表中包含的类型具有无参数构造函数或处理 事件， 默认为 `true`。 defaults to `true` if the type contained in the list has a parameterless constructor or the event is handled. 如果未处理 事件或列表类型没有无参数构造函数，则 默认为 `false`。If the event is not handled or the list type does not have a parameterless constructor, then defaults to `false`. 如果显式设置了 ，则绑定对象将始终使用设置值来确定是否可以向列表中添加新项。If is explicitly set, the set value will always be used by bound objects to determine if new items can be added to the list. 无论 是 `true` 还是 `false`，如果列表类型具有无参数构造函数或处理 事件，则可以通过显式调用 来添加新项。Whether is `true` or `false`, new items can be added by explicitly calling if the list type has a parameterless constructor or the event is handled. 此外，设置 会导致类型 事件发生。In addition, setting causes a event of type to occur. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For the complete example, see the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当列表项类型实现 接口时，才会引发项值更改 通知。 notifications for item value changes are only raised if the list item type implements the interface. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理 事件。The following code example demonstrates how handle the event. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类概述主题。For the complete example, see the class overview topic. param.span: 包含事件数据的 。

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件和 方法允许将自定义创建的项添加到列表。The event and the method allow custom-created items to be added to the list. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将检查列表类型，以查看它是否实现了 接口，以指示当在各个列表项上更改属性值时，它将引发 事件。 checks the list type to see if it implements the interface to indicate that it raises events of when property values are changed on individual list items. 不能在派生类中重写此成员。This member cannot be overridden in a derived class.
